titleStmt.title: M. Deputy Recorders speech at the Chequer Barr to Baron Trever at the Lord Majors taking his oath on Thursday the 18. day of August 1642. With the said Barons reply, with the Lord Majors oath, and the last declaration from the House of Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Regarding the censure of Lord Mayor Sir Richard Gurney by the Lords in Parliament and their choice of Alderman Pennington to replace him.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
